name: Life of the Party (dan.collins.dev)
description:
In this "micro-vania" you play as a party crasher determined to become the "life of the party." Impress partiers with dances that you learn along the way. Impress enough people and you will be allowed in the party zone.

Controls

  • Up - W key / D-Pad Up
  • Down / Crouch - S key / D-Pad Down
  • Left - A key / D-Pad Left
  • Right - D key / D-Pad Right
  • Jump - Spacebar / PS Cross / Xbox A
  • Pause - Escape / PS Options / Xbox Start
  • Map - M key / PS L1 / Xbox L
  • Basic Dance - K key / PS Square / Xbox X
  • Learned Dance 1 - I key / PS Triangle / Xbox Y
  • Learned Dance 2 - O key / PS Circle / Xbox B
  • Learned Dance 3 - P key / PS R1 / Xbox R

External Assets Used

  • PressStart2P.ttf - https://www.dafont.com/press-start-2p.font
  • post-adventure_tea_party.wav - https://opengameart.org/content/post-adventure-tea-party
  • Juhani Junkala [Chiptune Adventures] 2. Stage 2.ogg - https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure
